class.name: InputMatrix
class.documentation: This object contains this attributes to set how to interpret data stored in 2-dimensional arrays in memory.

parameter.name: input_simple_field
parameter.documentation: For internal testing only, or very specifivc users request!

parameter.name: input_wind_u_component
parameter.documentation: Array containing U velocity component for wind field

parameter.name: input_wind_v_component
parameter.documentation: Array containing V velocity component for wind field

parameter.name: input_field_organization
parameter.documentation: How data is organized in the input field (REGULAR /IRREGULAR/)

parameter.name: input_mars_metadata
parameter.documentation: Json Object that contains metadata to descrive the the input data: will be used by the automatic eccharts contouring

parameter.name: input_field_subpage_mapping
parameter.documentation: Position of first point of array (1,1) on the subpage, (see text)(UPPER_LEFT / UPPER_RIGHT / LOWER_LEFT / LOWER_RIGHT / UPPER_LEFT_TRANSPOSED / UPPER_RIGHT_TRANSPOSED / LOWER_LEFT_TRANSPOSED / LOWER_RIGHT_TRANSPOSED)

parameter.name: input_wind_speed
parameter.documentation: Array containing speed component for wind field

parameter.name: input_wind_direction
parameter.documentation: Array containing direction component for wind field

parameter.name: input_field_suppress_below
parameter.documentation: Values in the input field(s) below this value are to be suppressed, i.e. not to be taken into consideration for plotting purposes

parameter.name: input_field_suppress_above
parameter.documentation: Values in the input field(s) above this value are to be suppressed, i.e not to be taken into consideration for plotting purposes
